scripts.install:all: npm install && concurrently "cd server && npm install" "cd client && npm install --legacy-peer-deps"
scripts.setup: npm install && concurrently "npm run setup:server" "npm run setup:client"
scripts.setup:server: cd server && npm install && npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push
scripts.setup:client: cd client && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build
